name: Ponged Multiverse
description:
The retro multiverse has been PONGED!!!

Contains Pong with Sonic, Mario and Zelda physics inspired by level up's pong crossovers.

This is a 2 player game, so bring your friend along!

Available for all major platforms, downloadable version for Windows while browser version for all other platforms.

Controls and Instructions

  • On the title screen select your preferred character - Mario, Sonic or Link.
  • Tap or press any key when you are ready on the level's title screen.
  • For touch screen devices, move your character just by using your touch. 
  • For using some power ups (Boomerang and Fire Flower), you need to tap on your character or use the keyboard power up controls as listed below.
  • Player 1 Keyboard Controls:
    • 'W' and 'S' keys to move up and down respectively.
    • 'X' key for using the power up.
  • Player 2 Keyboard Controls:
    • 'I' and 'K' keys to move up and down respectively.
    • 'M' key for using the power up.

This game is MADE WITH GODOT.
